ygData.subject: Re: Brewing
ygData.messageBody:
<html><div>At 01:16 PM 7/11/99 -0400, you wrote:</div>
<div>>From: "TommyC"
<uber_sorcerer@...></div>
<div>></div>
<div>>Hail all,</div>
<div>>Can anyone please list the brewing recipes in level order I have
108 skill</div>
<div>>in brewing and don't know which one to try next.</div>
<div>>Thanking ye all in advance,</div>
<div>>Pinen</div>
<div>>Hopeless Bard of the Rathe</div>
<div>>Master Brewer of the NwN</div>
<div>>Bard of the 9th Song</div>
<div>></div>
<br>
There is a EQBrewers@onelist.com mailing list that this would be more
appropriate for 8)  However, it is not clear what the correct order
is for making them to build skill but I will tell you that with where you
are the Ol' Tujims is the only one discovered that will take you to the
max of 135.  The 135 is all that anyone has achieved so far but we
think there is more out there that will raise it above this.
<BR>

<div align="center">
------------------------------------------------------------------------
<br>
<b>Albereth - 20th Circle Halfling Druid<br>
Master Brewer<br>
The Arcane Order<br>
Mithaniel Marr Server<br>
</b>------------------------------------------------------------------------
<br>
</html>
